sections.heading: Financial hardship; deferral, waiver or reduction of fees8-122
sections.text: Financial hardship; deferral, waiver or reduction of feesThe court, an agency or the division may voluntarily defer, waive or reduce any fee if payment of the fee would cause a hardship to the adoptive parent or would be detrimental to t
